Package pacman

A package containing all of the core Pac-Man game machinery.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Display An interface for classes which can display the Pac-Man game.
PacManPlayer An interface for classes that can choose Pac-Man's moves, conditioned on the history and the ghost players.
StateEvaluator An interface for classes which can estimate the value of a state in a Pac-Man game.
 

Class Summary
Game A class representing a Pac-Man game and its current state.
GhostPlayer An abstract class for class that can choose a ghost's moves in the Pac-Man game.
KeyboardPacManPlayer  
Location A class representing a location on the Pac-Man game board, with x and y coordinates.
LocationSet An efficient implementation of a Set of object of type Location, which uses bit-packing internally to speed up equals() and hashCode() implementations.
PacManGUI  
PacManGUIGameBoard  
PacManGUILivesBoard  
PacManGUIScoreBoard  
State A class representing a state of a Pac-Man board, as defined by the pacman.Game class.
TextDisplay  
 

Enum Summary
Move Represents a Move for one of the agents in the Pac-Man game: Pac-Man or any of the ghosts.
 

Package pacman Description

A package containing all of the core Pac-Man game machinery.
